name: wiretap
description: > _"While our competitors are deploying today's strategies, we're already > frontrunning tomorrow's mistakes."_ > > — Copyright © Franklin J. Merrimont, Founder & Chairman, The Firm

scripts.dev: turbo run build:packages && turbo run dev
scripts.dev:encore-api: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm turbo run dev --filter={@wiretap/encore-api,'./packages/*'}
scripts.dev:workers: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build --filter=@wiretap/temporal && pnpm --filter @wiretap/temporal run dev
scripts.start:workers: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build --filter=@wiretap/temporalio --force && pnpm --filter @wiretap/temporal run start
scripts.dev:webapp: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm turbo run dev --filter={@wiretap/webapp,'./packages/*'}
scripts.test: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test ; pnpm run test-db:stop
scripts.test:watch:temporal: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test:watch --ui=tui --filter=@wiretap/temporal; pnpm run test-db:stop
scripts.test:watch:db: pnpm run test-db:start && pnpm run test-db:migration && turbo run test:watch --ui=tui --filter=@wiretap/db; pnpm run test-db:stop
